title: I call BS
body: I leave one match ever, and i get 20 min wait.... I get Trash talked, verbal abuse, put down by team mates so i leave and i am the one that gets punished? What did they get? So unfair.. Or did i do something wrong?

replies.body:
Come on dude its only 20 minutes. Why dont you use the time to cool off and get a drink. leaverbuster exists for a reason even if other bad behaviors are not properly dealt with.

Just because you had to wait 20 minutes for a game, means that nobody should be punished for leaving also? 
What makes you entitled to preferential treatment? 
Instead of just complaining perhaps next time you could suggest a solution at the same time?

Just some food for thought.

Yeah, you're supposed to put up with it for years, or stop playing the game entirely. Perfectly fair.....

Just in case, ^^ Sarcasm

The mere title of this forum is a on-going joke at Rito
